import React, { useState } from 'react' import Navbar from '../components/Navbar' import Footer from '../components/Footer' import Box from '@mui/material/Box'; import Container from '@mui/material/Container'; import Typography from '@mui/material/Typography'; import { useContext } from 'react' import { UserContext } from '../App'; import Button from '@mui/material/Button'; import AddIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Add'; import '../App.css' //ver que pija pasa con la fuente que no anda si la pongo en App.css //ver que pasa que tiene que dejar de renderisarse en el div de ejercicios pero sigue ahi al clicekar //todo lo demas anda perfect //no me lee la prop dia de cadadiv green q selecciono, me la toma comos string function DragExercises() { const [day, setDay] = useState('') const {list, setList} = useContext(UserContext); const handleClickDayButton = (id) => { console.log(day) setDay(id) } const hadleClickGreenButton = (movement, exercise) => { if (day) { console.log(list) } else { return } } return ( <> Select exercises {Object.keys(list).map(movement => {list[movement] .map((exercise) => exercise.isClicked && !exercise.monday && !exercise.tuesday && !exercise.wednesday && !exercise.thursday && !exercise.friday && !exercise.saturday && !exercise.sunday && )} )}
Monday
Tuesday
Wednesday
Thursday
Friday
Saturday
Sunday
)} export default DragExercises
